c74object.name: jit.mo.func
c74object.digest: Generate animated single dim matrices using a specified function
c74object.description: Generate animated single dim matrices using a specified function. Similar in nature to a sound oscillator, jit.mo.func can generate time-varying cell values across a matrix based on a given function.

objarg.name: Dimension
objarg.digest: Set the dimension (number of elements) of the output matrix
objarg.description: Set the dimension (number of elements) of the output matrix. Will be overriden if to attached jit.mo.join object via the join attribute. jit.mo objects only support matrices with a dimcount of 1.

method.name: rand
method.digest: Generate new random values for rand_amt offset
method.description: Generate new random values for rand_amt offset.

attribute.name: join
attribute.description: Sets the jit.mo.join object binding. When set, animation parameters are controlled by the named object.

attribute.name: function
attribute.digest: The fuction type used for generating matrices
attribute.description: The fuction type used for generating matrices. Available functypes are line, sin, saw, tri, perlin

attribute.name: delta
attribute.digest: Frame delta time for animating graph (default = 0.0)
attribute.description: Frame delta time for animating graph (default = 0.0). When bound to jit.mo.join this value is set automatically.

attribute.name: period
attribute.digest: The period length for the perlin noise function (default = 8)
attribute.description: The period length for the perlin noise function (default = 8).

attribute.name: loop
attribute.digest: Enable and disable phase looping when animating (default = 1)
attribute.description: Enable and disable phase looping when animating (default = 1). Non-looped animation can be reset by setting phase to 0

attribute.name: freq
attribute.description: Output frequency (default = 1.0). Number of times the function is repeated over the width of the matrix
